title: Harold Lloyd's world of comedy
creator_credit: Harold Lloyd and Harold Lloyd Corporation
brief_description: Presents a compilation of the best short Harold Lloyd sequences. Films excerpted include: ‘Safety last’, ‘Hot water’, ‘Why worry’, ‘Feet first’, ‘Girl shy’, ‘Movie crazy’, ‘Professor beware’.
